title: Places Plants and Animals Live
description: This book introduces students to the various environments of animals and plants on Earth. Animal cards are provided for students to cut apart and place in the appropriate environment in the book. Repetitive phrases and high-frequency words support early readers.
meta: mountains, plains, rainforests, salty, steep, tundra
Use the reading strategy of connecting to prior knowledge to understand text
Alphabetizing : List words in alphabetical order

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
